projects.text: A PROJECT IS COMPLETE WHEN IT STARTS WORKING FOR YOU, RATHER THAN YOU WORKING FOR IT.

project.heading: A Blockchain Based E-Voting platform
project.title: ElectChain
text: Designed and developed a blockchain-based E-Voting android application.
Implemented features like proof of work based secured voting transactions, also managing the registration, voting, and results.
project.Used: Used: Kotlin, Node.Js, Solidity, Metamask, Ropston Test Network.

project.heading: A Blogging Website for travellers
project.title: Nomadic
text: Designed, built and deployed a MERN stack-based web application to store and explore travel Blogs.
Implemented email login using JWT and OAuth Google login for user authentication.
Set up database with Mongo DB Atlas to store users, post and implement its edit, upvote and delete functionality.
project.Used: Used: React, Node, Express, MongoDB (mongoose, Atlas), Redux.

project.heading: browsering timelapses
project.title: Timeflux
text: Developed a React application to explore slow Mo and Time-Lapse videos.
Implemented email login using Firebase.
Set up database with Firebase to store information of user, posts and comments.

project.heading: personal Portfolio
project.title: Portfolio
text: Developed Personal Portfolio using ReactJs
Explored tailwind-css for the styling

project.heading: Localify
project.title: Grocery Delivery App
text: Developed application to find nearby stores and their real time stock
The app allowed users to order groceries from the nearby stores

project.heading: Visulization of algorithm
project.title: CPU Scheduling Algorithm App
text: Solve problems of CPU Scheduling algorithm, solution will show you which process is at which state at every point of time.
It helps to understand how CPU Scheduling algorithms works.

project.heading: fantasy auction simullator
project.title: Auction11
text: Developed API for the fantasy auction simullator
Developed using NodeJs, ExpressJs and MongoDB

project.heading: Game Development
project.title: AirHockey
text: Developed Airhockey using Java

project.heading: programming language
project.title: Sanskritava
text: By leveraging Java as the underlying implementation language and incorporating the Sanskrit-inspired syntax, the project aimed to enable developers to write code that closely aligns with natural language patterns while achieving the desired program outcomes.
Designed grammer and parsed using antlr
The language will provide support for basic operations such as arithmetic calculations, variable assignment, and conditional statements.
Created a functional programming language in Java, utilizing an intermediate code representation for efficient execution and translation of sample code into the expected output.

Details: Created an innovative business management application using Flutter, Node.js, and MongoDB, which included features such as sauda management, automated data summary tools, and enhanced accessibility criteria for clients of Welcome Broker
Designed & Developed an end-to-end applications from scratch, Led end-to-end development efforts, including project management, software design, coding, testing, and deployment

Utilized Docker and AWS to ensure seamless scalability and performance optimization. This resulted in a highly functional and user-friendly application, empowering clients to effectively manage their businesses and optimize their operations

Implemented features like a project management tool, CI/CD automation management, and testing automation management in the back-end utilizing Java working on KaizIQ project, which is a tool that brings together Project Management, Testing, CI/CD Pipelines and Deployments into one space.
Developed front-end screens for features like automated API Testing and automated Deployment using ReactJS.
